name: Farmer Sim 2015
description:
Farmer Sim 2015 is the latest farming simulator that will allow you to become a real farmer! Start your agricultural career by cultivating crops in your lands! You can plow, sow and harvest using lots of different machineries! Sell your harvest for money to take control of new tractors and combines! Enjoy the new farming simulator playing in an open-world career mode! Have fun using farming vehicles and become a professional farmer! Download now Farmer Sim 2015!

Features:
- Realistic Vehicles and Machineries (tractors, combines, plows, harvesters, seeders, trailers...)
- Easy Tutorial
- Grow different plants
- Buy animals and manage them
- Purchase new fields
- Open-World career mode
- Sell crops for money
- USA and European maps
- Auto driving feature
- Day-Night Cycle
- Steering Wheel, Buttons or Tilting controls
- Challenge your friends by sharing online your statistics and achievements!

Become a real farmer by playing this amazing farming simulator!
